A Strangely shaped blade that extends from either side of the grip, the blade monomolecularly thin and seem to flicker in and out of reality.
Infinite Ammo, No Reloads needed.

description.value:
Special: Corrosive, Razor Sharp, Tearing

Note: A Strangely shaped blade that extends from either side of the grip, the blade monomolecularly thin and seem to flicker in and out of reality. Infinite Ammo, No Reloads needed.
